name: work_from_home_day
description: Control smart home devices (lights, thermostat, locks, camera, speakers) by manipulating objects and calling their methods to automate home scenes.

turns.query: I'm starting my work-from-home day in the home office. First, check the office temperature sensor - if it's below 20°C or above 25°C, set the thermostat to 22°C for comfort. Turn on the office light to 80% brightness for productivity. Open the office blinds to 70% to let in natural light but reduce glare. Turn on the office smart plug (connected to my monitor) so my workstation powers up. Enable do-not-disturb on the doorbell so I'm not interrupted. Make sure the robot vacuum is docked and NOT cleaning during work hours.

I have an important video call starting now. Adjust the office for the call: increase the office light to 100% for better video quality. Close the office blinds to 50% to reduce backlight from the window. Check if any noisy devices are running - if the robot vacuum is cleaning, pause it. If the living room speaker is playing, stop it. Also make sure the doorbell is still in do-not-disturb mode.

My work day is done! Time to transition to relaxation mode. Turn off the office smart plug (monitor off). Dim the office light to 30% (I'll stay here to read). Open all blinds in the house to enjoy the evening light. Disable do-not-disturb on the doorbell since I can receive visitors now. Check the robot vacuum - if battery is above 60% and dustbin is below 70%, start it cleaning the living room in auto mode since I'm done with calls.
